sub_title: Global Sr. Strategic Planner at TBWA\Neboko | @adidasglobal & Cultural Strategy Lead (EU) at \Backslash
summary:
Hi, My names is Peter Kormanyos. I am a Hungarian expat living in Amsterdam. Once I was a Hercules Hollywood movie background talent. I had 45+ Tinder dates and found myself at the stage of TEDxYouth@Budapest talking about it. I was also a professional basketball player for 16 years & it's still one of my passions nowadays. In the end, somehow, I became a planner.  

I believe in cultural fluidity. Because who you are, where you come from, the people you meet and the path you take, are all part of what you uniquely bring to the craft of strategy. It's not just about where you are from anymore. It's about where you are going. It's about the ability to move seamlessly between cultures and subcultures. Culture is out there. You can read about it and follow it on social media, but I'm a big believer that you have to get out there to know what's going on. That's why I always try to share a life-influenced strategic approach to give brands a meaningful position in culture.

You can find my portfolio at:  https://www.peterkormanyos.com/ (ask me for the pw)

profile_positions.title: Senior Global Strategic Planner

profile_positions.description:
I./ My day to day life at 14/DDB:

Lead strategist on CUPRA global (SEAT S.A.'s automotive challenger brand), which means the following duties: 

1./ Brand & comms strat. (CUPRA global brand strat., Launching CUPRA in Australia) // 2./ Social media strat. //  3./ Cultural strat. // 4./ Partnerships strat. (FC Barcelona, Primavera Sound, International Padel Federation, Wilson) // 5./ Lifestyle collaboration strat. (Mikaku, De Antonio Yachts etc.)// 6./ CUPRA racing strat. (Extreme-e, Pure ETCR & Hybrid Motorsport) 7./ Cupra Fleets & aftersales strat. (b2b brand platform development)

II./ Key milestones/achievements at 14/DDB:

1./ Leading the CUPRA brand launch for Australia | brand platform & creative concept development.
2./ Winning Wilson new business | Padel sport category global pitch for UK & DACH markets.
3./ Founder of "14 JAMS", our in-house cultural exploration platform.
4./ Developing a (sub)culture-led creative briefing process for the whole 14 agency network
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Strategic Planner

profile_positions.description:
My main duties were:

•	Drive the Telekom global & local brand strategy development process
•	Explore campaign based insights and cultural phenomena (cultural strategic planning)
•	Develop creative platforms for different segments (youth,b2b,family)
•	Facilitate the execution of the brand strategy
•	Develop & maintain the Telekom Electronic Beats popcultural platform/sub-brand
•	Maintain the Sport sponsorship strategy (inc. gaming/e-sport) from a brand POV
•	Manage brand projects  (e.g.: Internal BrandShop project)
•	Drive the value proposition thinking in collaboration with our business/product tribe
•	Contribute to the group level communication and social media strategy
•	Control and translate the brand surveys and its utilization - research planning
•	Organize internal brand related education programs
•	Founder and strategic concept creator of Magenta Kraft (our youth "sub-brand")
•	Author of the paper that won a Silver WARC Awards (Brand Purpose category)
profile_positions.title: Brand Strategist

profile_positions.title: Sr. Brand & Comms Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Together with Zoku, We launched a pioneering new creative platform to facilitate meaningful connections. Highlighting the importance of close personal bonds between neighbors and rekindling the neighborly spirit of the past, “Doors of Zoku” will feature a series of talks and workshops, as well as a playful public installation.
Declining social cohesion, growing social isolation and the lack of neighborly ties are amongst the greatest problems facing the citizens of the modern global metropolis. In Amsterdam alone, there is a growing number of people of all ages that experience feelings of being anonymous or lonely (GGD, Health Monitor Amsterdam, 2016). Next to elderly, this group also includes students, expats and immigrants. Amsterdam will continue to urbanize, causing growing anonymity within the city (Theo van Tilburg, Professor Sociology at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam, '17).
To raise awareness for this serious social concern, we have installed tiny interactive doors at several locations across the city. Passers-by will be drawn to the doors, and upon ringing the doorbells will be greeted by and participate in personal stories among neighbors. The installation will evoke the importance of forming personal relationships with neighbours.
The campaign’s main event took place on February 1st 2019 in Zoku’s Social Spaces. Featuring insightful talks, workshops and interactive activities – from smart city planning with figures from the Amsterdam municipality, to pro-social initiatives, to live music and art, the flagship event will give neighbors and guests the opportunity to meet and share ideas on the topic.

volunteer_experiences.role: Mentor at Coffee At A Distance
volunteer_experiences.description: Coffee At A Distance : an easy way for students and young talent to find people in the industry who are willing to talk, guide, and advise them virtually.

I was speaking about our word's digitalisation in connection with the human relationships and emotions. I did a funny research on Tinder, Happn and Jingle and I was dating more than 30 girls, because I wanted to understand this digital phenomenon, which is continuously transforming our human-relations in today's world.. To sum it up my presentation was built around one question: 
How will we be able to develop our human relations and emotions in today's digital world? 

You can check out my speech here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NyCUx6mT9Sg

This is my personal love project in my free time to help Tisza Shoes HU to be culturally relevant.

My key responsibilities are:

- Create yearly communication strategy in line with the key challenges and brand strategy.
- Create and manage custom reports.
- Define research-based key findings, conclusions,  cultural insights and implement them on a campaign strategy level.
- Oversee social media campaigns (PPC)
- Help in social media strategy (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn)

My main courses:
- Brand Bravery
- Insight Master Class
- Creative Briefing

I help to Julian Cole (ex. Head of Comms Strategy at BBDO New York) with a tones of planners from all over the world to make useful decks like the Brand Actions Library (2018,2019), 200 Ideas for under $20K, The Cannabis Marketing Economy and more, in order to inspire others and be inspired by awesome works, trends and data.

2016//  PHYGITAL MARKETING = Omni-channel customer experience. Algorithms and feelings.

2017// Digital Planning: How to stand out? // How to keep up? // How to add value?

2019 // How brands could find and explore unique insights/tensions with the help of design thinking in order to be culturally relevant in todays world.

My main courses:
- Digital Marketing
- Insight Master Class
- Creative Briefing
- Agency World Intro
